Test.Name: MaxSchedules="0"
Test.Description: wsdl: The device shall support at least one schedule.

Test.Name: MaxTimePeriodsPerDay="0"
Test.Description: wsdl: The maximum number of time periods per day the device supports in a schedule including special day schedule. The device shall support at least one time period per day.

Test.Name: MaxSpecialDayGroups="0"
Test.Description: wsdl: The maximum number of "SpecialDayGroup" entity the device supports. The value zero indicates that the device doesn't support "SpecialDayGroup" entity.

Test.Name: MaxSpecialDayGroups="2" MaxDaysInSpecialDayGroup="0"
Test.Description: The maximum number of days per "SpecialDayGroup" entity the device supports. The device shall support at least one day per "SpecialDayGroup" entity.

Test.Name: MaxSpecialDayGroups="0" MaxDaysInSpecialDayGroup="0"
Test.Description: The maximum number of days per "SpecialDayGroup" entity the device supports. The device shall support at least one day per "SpecialDayGroup" entity.

Test.Name: MaxSpecialDayGroups="2" MaxDaysInSpecialDayGroup="1"
Test.Description: The maximum number of days per "SpecialDayGroup" entity the device supports. The device shall support at least one day per "SpecialDayGroup" entity.

Test.Name: MaxDaysInSpecialDayGroup="1" MaxSpecialDaysSchedules="0"
Test.Description: wsdl: The maximum number of "SpecialDays" entities referred to by a schedule that the device supports. The device shall support at least one day per "SpecialDays" entity.

Test.Name: MaxDaysInSpecialDayGroup="1" MaxSpecialDaysSchedules="0"
Test.Description: wsdl: The maximum number of "SpecialDays" entities referred to by a schedule that the device supports. The device shall support at least one day per "SpecialDays" entity.
